43 typedef std::shared_ptr<class Source> SourceRef;
44 typedef std::shared_ptr<class Target> TargetRef;

47 class Io {
48  public:
49  typedef enum DataType { UINT8, INT8, UINT16, INT16, UINT32, INT32, FLOAT32, DATA_UNKNOWN } DataType;
50 
52  int32_t getSampleRate() const { return mSampleRate; }
54  int16_t getChannelCount() const { return mChannelCount; }
56  int16_t getBitsPerSample() const { return mBitsPerSample; }
58  int16_t getBlockAlign() const { return mBlockAlign; }
60  DataType getDataType() const { return mDataType; }
62  bool isInterleaved() const { return mIsInterleaved; }
64  bool isPcm() const { return mIsPcm; }
66  bool isFloat() const { return ( mDataType == FLOAT32 ); }
68  bool isBigEndian() const { return mIsBigEndian; }
69 
70  protected:
71 #if defined(CINDER_COCOA)
72  static void loadFromCaAudioStreamBasicDescription( Io * anIo, const AudioStreamBasicDescription * audioDescription );
73 #endif
74  Io()
75  : mSampleRate( 0 ), mChannelCount( 0 ), mBitsPerSample( 0 ), mBlockAlign( 0 ), mDataType( DATA_UNKNOWN ),
76  mIsInterleaved( true ), mIsPcm( false ), mIsBigEndian( false )
77  {}
78 
79  int32_t mSampleRate;
80  int16_t mChannelCount;
81  int16_t mBitsPerSample; //Significant Bits Per Sample
82  int16_t mBlockAlign; //BytesPerSample
83  DataType mDataType;
84  bool mIsInterleaved;
85  bool mIsPcm;
86  bool mIsBigEndian;
87 
88 #if defined(CINDER_COCOA)
89  //TODO: fix this
90  uint32_t mNativeFormatId;
91  uint32_t mNativeFormatFlags;
92  uint32_t mBytesPerPacket;
93  uint32_t mFramesPerPacket;
94  uint32_t mBytesPerFrame;
95 #endif
96 };

120  public:

123

151 struct IoRegistrar {
152  typedef SourceRef (*SourceCreationFunc)( DataSourceRef );
153 
154  static SourceRef createSource( DataSourceRef dataSource, std::string extension );
155 
156  static void registerSourceType( std::string extension, SourceCreationFunc func, int32_t priority = 2 );
157  static void registerSourceGeneric( SourceCreationFunc func, int32_t priority = 2 );
158 
159  private:
160 
161  struct Inst {
162  void registerSourceType( std::string extension, SourceCreationFunc func, int32_t priority );
163  void registerSourceGeneric( SourceCreationFunc func, int32_t priority );
164 
165  SourceRef createSource( DataSourceRef dataSource, std::string extension );
166 
167  std::map<std::string, std::multimap<int32_t,SourceCreationFunc> > mSources;
168  std::map<int32_t, SourceCreationFunc> mGenericSources;
169  };
170 
171  static IoRegistrar::Inst* instance();
172 
173  friend class Io;
174 };
175 
177 SourceRef load( const std::string &path, std::string extension = "" );
179 SourceRef load( DataSourceRef dataSource, std::string extension = "" );
180 
181 template<typename T>
182 struct IoRegistrant {
183  IoRegistrant() {
184  (void) register_object;
185  }
186  private:
187  struct exec_register {
188  exec_register() {
189  T::registerSelf();
190  }
191  };
192 
193  static exec_register register_object;
194 };
195 
196 template<typename D> typename IoRegistrant<D>::exec_register IoRegistrant<D>::register_object;
197 
198 #define REGISTER_AUDIOIO( TYPE ) \
199 struct IoRegisterT##TYPE : public IoRegistrant<TYPE> { \
200  IoRegisterT##TYPE() : IoRegistrant<TYPE>() {} \
201 };
202 
203 }} // namespace
